alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 4:32AM PST until January 21 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch, mainly north of Mount Jefferson. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized heavier accumulations of ice are likely near Mount Hood and the Columbia River Gorge, where up to an inch of new ice accumulation is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
